overview: A satirical look into the dynamics of a high school drumline. As tensions rise due to an out-of-control captain, past drama gets brought up in the form of a trouble-making tenor. This brings everyone to their boiling point and a choice must be made - either let the line fall, or become brothers in beats.
tagline: YES, WE FIGHT. BUT THAT'S WHAT MAKES US...
title: Brothers in Beats
